div.bibl: Die Abendpost, Jan. 8, 1890. FESTIVAL FOR THE HOME OF THE AGED.(Altenheim - Fest)

body.p: Northside Turn hall features the much spoken of Festival, and Mrs. Scherenberg prepared and excellent program. It is to be expected that the Chicago Germans manifest their interest and promote the welfare of the home, by their numerous attendance, and incidentally reward the committee of the ladies for their efforts. Concert commen cement is scheduled to be prompt at 8, followed by a festive dance (Ball).
